Movie.Name: Thor
Movie.Actors: Robert Downey Jr, Chris Hemsworth, Anthony Hopkins, Natalie Portman, Tom Hiddleston
Movie.Plot: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

Movie.Name: Iron man
Movie.Actors: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Terrence Howard, Jeff Bridges
Movie.Plot: When wealthy industrialist Tony Stark is forced to build an armored suit after a life-threatening incident, he ultimately decides to use its technology to fight against evil.
